content.description: In the following procedure, the parameter str is a string and the parameter num is a number.
content.question: PROCEDURE printArgs(str, num){DISPLAY(num)DISPLAY(str)DISPLAY(num)}Consider the following code segment.printArgs("**", 1)printArgs("*", 2)What is displayed as a result of executing the code segment?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
